001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnoreProperties;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude.Include;
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.PrettyPrinter;
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.TypeReference;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.util.DefaultIndenter;
010import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.util.DefaultPrettyPrinter;
011import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
012import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
013import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.SerializationFeature;
014import com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype.jsr310.JavaTimeModule;
015import lombok.Getter;
016import lombok.NonNull;
017import lombok.ToString;
018import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
019import org.apache.commons.lang3.exception.ExceptionUtils;
020
021import java.io.File;
022import java.io.FileInputStream;
023import java.io.IOException;
024import java.io.InputStream;
025import java.util.List;
026import java.util.Map;
027
028import static org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils.isBlank;
029
030/**
031 * Utility class to serialize / de-serialize JSON-Objects and JSON-Arrays
032 * using <a href="https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson">Jackson Library</a>
033 * <hr/>
034 * TODO: git rid of this class or move it to proper place !!!
035 *
036 * @see <a href="https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-docs">
037 *     Jackson Library Documentation
038 * </a>
039 */
040@Slf4j
041public class JacksonUtils {
042
043    @Getter
044    @ToString
045    @JsonInclude(Include.NON_EMPTY)
046    @JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = true)
047    public static class AnyError {
048        private final String exceptionClass;
049        private final String message;
050        private final List<String> stackTrace;
051        public AnyError(@NonNull Exception ex) {
052            this.exceptionClass = ex.getClass().getName();
053            this.message = ex.getMessage();
054            this.stackTrace = ExceptionUtils.getRootCauseStackTraceList(ex);
055        }
056    }
057
058    @Getter @ToString
059    @JsonInclude(Include.NON_EMPTY)
060    @JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = true)
061    public static class JsonError extends AnyError {
062        private final String originalMessage;
063        private final String location;
064        public JsonError(JsonProcessingException jsonEx) {
065            super(jsonEx);
066            this.originalMessage = jsonEx.getOriginalMessage();
067            this.location = jsonEx.getLocation() == null ? "" : jsonEx.getLocation().toString();
068        }
069    }
070
071    public static AnyError errorFrom(Exception ex) { return new AnyError(ex); }
072    public static JsonError errorFrom(JsonProcessingException jsonEx) { return new JsonError(jsonEx); }
073
074    private static final ObjectMapper OBJECT_MAPPER_DUMP =
075        new ObjectMapper()
076            .registerModule(new JavaTimeModule())
077            .enable(SerializationFeature.INDENT_OUTPUT);
078
079    public static JsonNode jsonTreeFromString(String jsonContent) {
080        try {
081            return OBJECT_MAPPER_DUMP.readTree(jsonContent);
082        } catch (JsonProcessingException jsonEx) {
083            throw new IllegalArgumentException(
084                String.format("could not read the JSON-Tree:%n---%n'%s'%n---%n", jsonContent), jsonEx);
085        }
086    }
087
088    public static <T> T jsonValueFromString(String jsonContent, TypeReference<T> typeRef) {
089        try {
090            return OBJECT_MAPPER_DUMP.readValue(jsonContent, typeRef);
091        } catch (JsonProcessingException jsonEx) {
092            throw new IllegalArgumentException(
093                String.format("could not read <%s>:%n---%n'%s'%n---%n", typeRef, jsonContent), jsonEx);
094        }
095    }
096
097    public static Map<String, Object> jsonObjFromString(String jsonContent) {
098        // automatic casting to "java.util.Map" looks like a magic
099        return jsonValueFromString(jsonContent, new TypeReference<>(){});
100    }
101
102    public static List<Object> jsonArrFromString(String jsonContent) {
103        // automatic casting to "java.util.List" looks like a magic
104        return jsonValueFromString(jsonContent, new TypeReference<>(){});
105    }
106
107    public static JsonNode jsonTreeFromResource(String resourcePath) {
108        ClassLoader classLoader = Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader();
109        try (InputStream resourceStream = classLoader.getResourceAsStream(resourcePath)) {
110            return OBJECT_MAPPER_DUMP.readTree(resourceStream);
111        } catch (IOException ioEx) {
112            throw new IllegalArgumentException(
113                String.format("could not load the JSON-Tree from JSON-resource by path '%s'", resourcePath), ioEx);
114        }
115    }
116
117    public static <T> T jsonValueFromResource(String resourcePath, TypeReference<T> typeRef) {
118        ClassLoader classLoader = Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader();
119        try (InputStream resourceStream = classLoader.getResourceAsStream(resourcePath)) {
120            return OBJECT_MAPPER_DUMP.readValue(resourceStream, typeRef);
121        } catch (IOException ioEx) {
122            throw new IllegalArgumentException(
123                String.format("could not load <%s> from resource by path '%s'", typeRef, resourcePath), ioEx);
124        }
125    }
126
127    /**
128     * @param resourcePath the path to JSON-resource within the current class-path (no leading slash !!!)
129     * @return de-serialized JSON-Object as {@link Map}
130     */
131    public static Map<String, Object> jsonObjFromResource(String resourcePath) {
132        // automatic casting to "java.util.Map" looks like a magic
133        return jsonValueFromResource(resourcePath, new TypeReference<>(){});
134    }
135
136    /**
137     * @param resourcePath the path to JSON-resource within the current class-path (no leading slash !!!)
138     * @return de-serialized JSON-Object as {@link List}
139     */
140    public static List<Object> jsonArrFromResource(String resourcePath) {
141        // automatic casting to "java.util.List" looks like a magic
142        return jsonValueFromResource(resourcePath, new TypeReference<>(){});
143    }
144
145    /**
146     * @param jsonFile a file that contains JSON-value
147     * @return the root node of de-serialized JSON-Tree
148     */
149    public static JsonNode jsonTreeFromFile(File jsonFile) {
150        try (FileInputStream resourceStream = new FileInputStream(jsonFile)) {
151            return OBJECT_MAPPER_DUMP.readTree(resourceStream);
152        } catch (IOException ioEx) {
153            throw new IllegalArgumentException(
154                String.format("could not load the JSON-Tree from JSON-file '%s'", jsonFile), ioEx);
155        }
156    }
157
158    /**
159     * @param jsonFile a file that contains JSON-value
160     * @param typeRef a type-reference to cast the de-serialized object to
161     * @return de-serialized JSON-vlaue of type <code>T</code>
162     * @param <T> the type to de-serialize the JSON-value to
163     */
164    public static <T> T jsonValueFromFile(File jsonFile, TypeReference<T> typeRef) {
165        try (FileInputStream resourceStream = new FileInputStream(jsonFile)) {
166            return OBJECT_MAPPER_DUMP.readValue(resourceStream, typeRef);
167        } catch (IOException ioEx) {
168            throw new IllegalArgumentException(
169                String.format("could not load <%s> from JSON-file '%s'", typeRef, jsonFile), ioEx);
170        }
171    }
172
173    /**
174     * @param jsonFile a file that contains JSON-Object
175     * @return de-serialized JSON-Object as {@link Map}
176     */
177    public static Map<String, Object> jsonObjFromFile(File jsonFile) {
178        // automatic casting to "java.util.Map" looks like a magic
179        return jsonValueFromFile(jsonFile, new TypeReference<>(){});
180    }
181
182    /**
183     * @param jsonFile a file that contains JSON-Array
184     * @return de-serialized JSON-Object as {@link List}
185     */
186    public static List<Object> jsonArrFromFile(File jsonFile) {
187        // automatic casting to "java.util.List" looks like a magic
188        return jsonValueFromFile(jsonFile, new TypeReference<>(){});
189    }
190
191    private JacksonUtils() {
192        // prohibit the creation of utility-class instance
193        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Cannot instantiate utility-class " + getClass().getName());
194    }
195}
